name: Plivo
long_description: Plivo's platform helps businesses create and deploy AI Agents for various roles like customer support, marketing engagement, lead qualification across channels like WhatsApp, Voice calls, Web and Mobile Chat, Email & SMS. Plivo's platform powers billions of transactions each year globally for thousands of businesses worldwide like Uber, Meta, Zomato, Deckers etc.
one_liner: AI Agents for customer engagement on WhatsApp, Voice, Chat & SMS.
